list.expr: group(cnch_config_build_info{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}) by (version_scm) unless (group(cnch_config_build_info{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}) by (version_scm) offset 1m)
list.name: cnch-version

panels.description: CPU usage per pod, compared to it's limit and request. Pod are guaranteed to be provided the requested CPU but Throttled if they reach the limit.
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description:
Memory usage per pod, compared to it's limit and request. Pod are guaranteed to be provided the requested memory but OOMKilled if they reach the limit.
Working Set Size (WSS) is an estimate of how much memory cannot be evicted, representing the memory required to keep working (hot active cache is counted).
It's calculated by "total usage - inactive file". It includes recently accessed memory, dirty memory, and kernel memory.
panels.title: Memory Usage (WSS)

panels.description:
RSS is basically the non-cache memory usage.
Note:
Only anonymous and swap cache memory is listed as part of 'rss' stat.
This should not be confused with the true 'resident set size' or the
amount of physical memory used by the cgroup.
see https://www.kernel.org/doc/Documentation/cgroup-v1/memory.txt
panels.title: Memory Usage (RSS)

targets.expr:
sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", container!="dynamic-config"}[5m])) by (pod, container)
/ sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container!="", container!="dynamic-config"}[5m])) by (pod, container)

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))
ceil(sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_total{container!="", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])))
ceil(sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_total{container!="", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{container!="", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))
sum by(pod) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{container!="", namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m]))

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_receive_packets_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_packets_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))

sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) namespace_workload_pod:kube_pod_owner:relabel{namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~"$workload", workload_type="$type", pod=~"$pod"}) by (pod))
group(cnch_config_build_info{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}) by (version_scm)
cnch_tso_metrics_is_leader{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"} == 1

panels.description: Number of Pods in Running state
panels.title: Pods Running

panels.description: Rate of TSO requests by Cnch servers.

targets.expr: cnch:tso:requests:total_rate5m{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", workload=~".*server.*"}

panels.title: TSO Servers Requests Per Sec

panels.description: Rate of TSO requests by Cnch workers.

targets.expr: cnch:tso:requests:total_rate5m{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", workload!~".*server.*"}

panels.title: TSO Workers Requests Per Sec

panels.description: Error rate of requests from cnch servers calculated by dividing the rate of failure / rate of total queries
panels.title: TSO Servers Requests Error Rate

panels.description: Error rate of requests from cnch workers calculated by dividing the rate of failure / rate of total queries
panels.title: TSO Workers Requests Error Rate

panels.description: Evolution of TSO Leader. Ideally this graph should never change as we don't want frequent leader changes

targets.expr: sum(cnch_tso_metrics_is_leader{namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}) by (pod, tso_leader_endpoint) == 1

panels.title: TSO Leader
